languages.text: Квартал черни — это помойная яма, куда скидывают трупы на прокорм животным, и едва ли бесценное тело Вольного Торговца будет лежать здесь. Наверняка оно где-то в богатом квартале. Вопрос — как туда вернуться?

traits.locale_text: Квартал черни — это помойная яма, куда скидывают трупы на прокорм животным, и едва ли бесценное тело Вольного Торговца будет лежать здесь. Наверняка оно где-то в богатом квартале. Вопрос — как туда вернуться?

languages.text: The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.
languages.original_text: Квартал черни — это помойная яма, куда скидывают трупы на прокорм животным, и едва ли бесценное тело Вольного Торговца будет лежать здесь. Наверняка оно где-то в богатом квартале. Вопрос — как туда вернуться?

traits.locale_text: The rabble's quarter is a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is hardly where the Rogue Trader's precious body is to be found. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter. But there is no obvious way to get back there.

The rabble's quarter is a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is hardly where the Rogue Trader's precious body is to be found. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter. But there is no obvious way to get back there.

The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

languages.text: Das Viertel des Gesindels ist kaum mehr als eine Jauchegrube, in der Leichen als Tierfutter entsorgt werden. Es ist sehr unwahrscheinlich, dass der wertvolle Körper {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sich hier befindet. Er muss irgendwo im Viertel der Wohlhabenden sein, aber es gibt keinen offensichtlichen Weg, dorthin zurückzukehren.
languages.original_text: The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

traits.locale_text: Das Viertel des Gesindels ist kaum mehr als eine Jauchegrube, in der Leichen als Tierfutter entsorgt werden. Es ist sehr unwahrscheinlich, dass der wertvolle Körper {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} sich hier befindet. Er muss irgendwo im Viertel der Wohlhabenden sein, aber es gibt keinen offensichtlichen Weg, dorthin zurückzukehren.

languages.text: Le quartier du petit peuple est un véritable cloaque où l'on jette les cadavres pour qu'ils servent de nourriture aux animaux. Il est peu probable que le précieux corps {rt_mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} s'y trouve. Il doit être dans le quartier affluent, mais encore faut-il réussir à y retourner.
languages.original_text: The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

traits.locale_text: Le quartier du petit peuple est un véritable cloaque où l'on jette les cadavres pour qu'ils servent de nourriture aux animaux. Il est peu probable que le précieux corps {rt_mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} s'y trouve. Il doit être dans le quartier affluent, mais encore faut-il réussir à y retourner.

languages.text: 贫民窟和粪坑差不了多少，尸体会被统一丢到这种地方，当成牲畜的饲料。行商浪人宝贵的躯体不太可能在这种地方，肯定是藏在富人区的某个地方。但现在，返回富人区的道路尚不明确。
languages.original_text: The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

traits.locale_text: 贫民窟和粪坑差不了多少，尸体会被统一丢到这种地方，当成牲畜的饲料。行商浪人宝贵的躯体不太可能在这种地方，肯定是藏在富人区的某个地方。但现在，返回富人区的道路尚不明确。

languages.text: El barrio del populacho es poco más que una fosa a la que se arrojan los cadáveres como alimento para los animales. Es poco probable que el valioso cuerpo de{rt_mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente esté ahí. Debe de estar en algún punto del barrio rico, pero no parece haber una ruta directa para volver allí.
languages.original_text: The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

traits.locale_text: El barrio del populacho es poco más que una fosa a la que se arrojan los cadáveres como alimento para los animales. Es poco probable que el valioso cuerpo de{rt_mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente esté ahí. Debe de estar en algún punto del barrio rico, pero no parece haber una ruta directa para volver allí.

languages.text: 下層エリアは、死体が動物の餌として投棄されるただの汚水溜まりに過ぎない。ローグトレーダーの貴重な体がそこにある可能性は非常に低い。おそらくは、富裕層のエリアのどこかにあるはずだが、そこへ戻る明確な道は見当たらない。
languages.original_text: The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

traits.locale_text: 下層エリアは、死体が動物の餌として投棄されるただの汚水溜まりに過ぎない。ローグトレーダーの貴重な体がそこにある可能性は非常に低い。おそらくは、富裕層のエリアのどこかにあるはずだが、そこへ戻る明確な道は見当たらない。

languages.text: Ayaktakımı mahallesi, cesetlerin hayvan yemi diye savrulduğu bir lağım çukurundan ibaret. Hür Tacir'in kıymetli bedeni orada olamaz. Herhâlde zengin muhitte gizli fakat oraya dönmenin gözle görülür bir yolu yok.
languages.original_text: The rabble's quarter is little more than a cesspit where corpses are dumped as animal feed. It is highly unlikely the Rogue Trader's precious body is there. It must be somewhere in the wealthy quarter, but there is no obvious way to get back to it.

traits.locale_text: Ayaktakımı mahallesi, cesetlerin hayvan yemi diye savrulduğu bir lağım çukurundan ibaret. Hür Tacir'in kıymetli bedeni orada olamaz. Herhâlde zengin muhitte gizli fakat oraya dönmenin gözle görülür bir yolu yok.
